mapper.select: select a.*, r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.description as role_description, r.create_time as role_create_time, r.create_admin_id as role_create_admin_id from admin a left join admin_role_relation arr on arr.admin_id = a.id left join role r on r.id = arr.role_id where a.username = #{username}

select a.*, r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.description as role_description, r.create_time as role_create_time, r.create_admin_id as role_create_admin_id from admin a left join admin_role_relation arr on arr.admin_id = a.id left join role r on r.id = arr.role_id where 1 = 1
and a.username = #{queryParam.username}
